name: From The Cradle To The Rave - Seven Deadly Singles EP
description:
"The Seven Deadly Singles EP" takes a different approach than the first C-Rave LP with each song deliberately short and to the point, and written with a direct head nod to a specific genre, punk, ska, dubstep, drumstep, dnb etc.. but all with 666% riotstep production of course! Lyrically the EP tackles ethics and morality in our modern societies and the battle of religion vs science in this arena. Do the cardinal sins matter any more? Should society allow religion to determine morals and ethics? How ethical is our culture and do we care about the right things?!

10 Tracks in just under twenty minutes and in full color digipak ltd edition CD

01. Preface 
02. Sloth 
03. Pride 
04. Envy 
05. Greed 
06. Wrath 
07. Gluttony 
08. The Quiet Before The Storm 
09. Lust 
10. Afterword

name: Beng Beng Cocktail/Atrocity Solution/My Own Religion - Track The Virus Split
description:
Released via Pumpkin Records and distro'd via us and a few others featuring BBC, Atrocity Solution and My Own Religion (C-Rave). Each band features 3 tracks and a bonus special track in a different style. As My Own Religion are no longer recording this comes in the form of an exclusive From The Cradle To The Rave track. Finally BBC and C-Rave wrote an instrumental track together and got special guest features from Public Serpents (ex choking victim, indk), Atrocity Solution, Stupid Stupid Henchmen and the mighty Ghetto Blaster in "The Virus".

1 - Beng Beng Cocktail - As we sow so we reap 
2 - Beng Beng Cocktail - Jesus Drinks Absynthe 
3 - Beng Beng Cocktail - Two Towers Fall Down 
4 - Atrocity Solution - Dark Days 
5 - Atrocity Solution - Stay True 
6 - Atrocity Solution - Demon in disguise 
7 - My Own Religion - 15 Minutes of Shame 
8 - My Own Religion - God And The State 
9 - My Own Religion - The Witch trials of Today

Bonus Tracks

10 - Beng Beng Cocktail Goes Electric - D.I.Y 
11 - From The Cradle To The Rave - Collapse the Gap 
12 - Atrocity Solution goes Acoustic - Watch the World Burn

Extra Track

13 - Beng Beng Cocktail + from The Cradle To The Rave featuring Atrocity Solution/Public Serpents/Stupid Stupid Henchmen/Ghetto Blaster - The Virus

**** THIS PRODUCT IS RELEASED ON 1st MAY 2011, ORDERS BEFORE THAT DATE WILL RECEIVE CD AS SOON AS IT DROPS ****
